title: Screen magazine. No. 04
brief_description:
Episode of Series “This is the United Nations”.
Cinemagazine item: Illustrates the work done within the framework of the United Nations Fellowship Program which provides an international system for the exchange of essential knowledge, to bring skills from where they are known to where they are needed. This Fellowship program covers all continents and is geared to a variety of peacetime problems.
